en.text:
1.5.5 (168)

- Fixed how ASIs are selected during Character Creation and when changing Species
- Changed several dialogs to the new Bottom Modal Sheet pattern
- Added Campaign Encounter Export/Import
- Added a dialog when equipping one-handed weapons asking about Main/Off-hand
- Added toggleable bonuses to Spells so they can be used in the Combat Tab as well
- Added an Item Randomizer in the Item Search dialog. Set filters and press Randomize!
- Moved Background Features to the Background card instead of copying them to the Feats list
